name: OnContact CRM Software
tag_list: crm-software, crm-solutions, crm, crm-applications, contact-management, sales-management, marketing-management, help-desk-software
overview:
Oncontact Software is a leading provider of customer relationship management (CRM) solutions for mid-market companies.

Oncontact is dedicated to providing mid-market companies with easy-to-use, quick to implement, cost-effective CRM solutions that enable you to better serve your customers and prospects.

Employ the CRM solution that:

Uses the latest .NET platform, so any .NET application can be easily integrated with Oncontact CRM
Easily integrates with third-party applications
Provides the same look and feel via an internal network or the Internet
Works with the industry-standard solutions such as Microsoft SQL Server and Oracle.

Oncontact Software has taken over 15 years of CRM experience and combined it with today’s leading technology to develop a completely redesigned .NET solution. Oncontact Software is a privately held company with a presence throughout North America, South America, Europe, Asia/Pacific and the Middle East. Oncontact Software’s products are available through its corporate headquarters in Wisconsin and an international alliance of value-added resellers, system integrators and distributors. Oncontact Software has over 600 customers worldwide, including Prudential, Foremost Insurance and Carfax.
